metadata.title: CVE-2024-32875 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Hugo is a static site generator. Starting in version 0.123.0 and prior toversion 0.125.3, title arguments in Markdown for links and images notescaped in internal render hooks. Hugo users who are impacted are those whohave these hooks enabled and do not trust their Markdown content files. Theissue is patched in v0.125.3. As a workaround, replace the templates withuser defined templates or disable the internal templates.

criterions.comment: hugo package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
